title: Oxfordshire Live: Monday 8 August - BBC News
summary: fears for man , 64 , missing and thought to be in oxfordshire .
waits for child mental health care are 'real problem ' .
stuck boy , 10 , rescued from seaside mud .
injury worries for oxford united after league 1 opener .
u 's end pursuit of motherwell winger marvin johnson .

documents.title: that 's all for today
text: thanks for joining us for all of the news from across oxfordshire today .
we 'll be back at 08:00 tomorrow morning , so be sure to join us .

documents.title: rowing back in time
text: while the team gb rowers of today look to win olympic gold in rio , here 's how the rowers during eights week in oxford spent their time in the 1920s .

documents.title: 80 countries , 80 anthems
text: here 's a world tour with a difference .
capri everitt is 11 , from vancouver in canada , and is raising money for a children 's charity by visiting 80 countries and singing their national anthems in the native language .
she popped by to visit us in oxford to tell us what it 's all about , and show off her vocal skills

documents.title: man admits raping two-year-old girl
text: a man has admitted raping a two-year-old girl and dozens of other sexual offences .
daniel kilbee , 34 , of bradstocks way , sutton courtenay , was convicted of 31 sex crimes against five victims between 1997 and 2015 .
during two trials in july and august he was found guilty of sexual assault and indecency with a child .
he pleaded guilty to further crimes including rape and making indecent images of children .

documents.title: oxford flood project work begins
text: more than 50 boreholes are being dug along the proposed course of the oxford flood alleviation channel over the next five weeks .
ground investigations are starting today after the preferred route was announced earlier this year .
flooding caused widespread disruption in february 2014 with homes and major city routes cut off for days - some train services also had to be stopped .
the environment agency said the planned channel would run from north of botley road to munday 's bridge , kennington .

documents.title: appeal for sightings of man , 6ft 8in tall
text: police are appealing for sightings of a man measuring at least 6ft 8in tall , who has gone missing in banbury .
john bolton , also known as shane bolton , was reported missing from his home on thursday .
he is white , 46-years-old , about 6ft 8 or 9ins and of stocky build .
he has access to a grey citroen c5 car with the registration gn52 fja .

documents.title: overturned car causes delays
text: # m40 : overturned car london bound between j4 , # highwycombe and j3 , # loudwater , because of recovery work .
dealys of 20+mins

documents.title: people should be paid to recycle plastic bottles , says bampton-based cpre president
text: shops should pay customers 10p for every plastic bottle they bring back for recycling , the president of the campaign to protect rural england has said .
author: Oxford Mail

documents.title: traffic plan to be reviewed after countryfile live 'chaos '
text: traffic management will be reviewed ahead of next year 's countryfile live - if it happens .
drivers complained of `` traffic chaos '' and hour-long delays at the bbc event on thursday and friday .
the chief executive of blenheim palace , john hoy , says he does n't want the weekend to be remembered for the wrong reasons .
inevitably if you have large volumes of people going to anything it is going to take time to get there and possibly time to get out .

documents.title: buses replacing trains between oxford and didcot
text: buses are replacing trains between oxford and didcot parkway until 14 august -
@ twitterid why do you illustrate this with a of snow when it 's august ?
hi louise .
it 's a photo of water to represent the flood prevention works being undertaken by network rail at hinksey .
grant
@ twitterid sorry , my eyes are pretty good , that is clearly snow !
when was water white and settled ?
it 's a photo from network rail taken at the site of flooding on tracks last year .
i guess we all see things differently .
grant
yes impressed by engineering work under hot summer sun on saturday
our friends at @ twitterid have certainly been busy !
work ongoing until sunday : ) grant
photos of floods might confuse and is a negative message .
perhaps use positive images / work underway from @ twitterid
thanks for the feedback .
will bear in mind for future posts .
we 're sharing @ twitterid posts during the works too .
grant
and they 're doing one hell of a job .
i had literally no waiting time on those legs for last week 's holiday !
hello , glad to hear it 's worked out well for you !
hope you had a nice holiday : ) -andy
absolutely - the sprinters and pacers wo n't be around for ever

documents.title: missing man could have travelled to oxfordshire
text: police are searching for a man who went missing from winchcombe in gloucestershire on 20 july .
nigel wise , 64 , left home to get his car serviced and has since missed two other appointments .
his blue vauxhall zafira , registration vo16 lfl , has been found in chippenham in wiltshire today and police believe he may have travelled to oxfordshire .
to provide information , call gloucestershire constabulary on 101 and quote incident 100 of 22 july .

documents.title: oxford united end pursuit of motherwell 's marvin johnson
text: # oufc after rejected bid oxford utd have ended pursuit of motherwell 's marvin johnson according to michael appleton
nice to know we 're still in the market for additional attacking options and willing to pay a fee as well !

documents.title: 'scrap bus lane and put electronic system on toll bridge to cut jams ' says councillor
text: calls have been made for a 'smart card ' system at the swinford toll bridge to be included in major improvements to cut daily traffic jams .
author: Oxford Times

documents.title: hunt on for thieves posing as police officers
text: two men who posed as police officers to rob a witney woman in her 80s are being hunted by police .
between 21:20 and 21:45 on thursday , two men forced their way into a home in hailey road .
when they were confronted by the woman , they said they were police officers and held up what appeared to be id cards .
they told her they were there as a result of a burglary and needed to check her money .

documents.title: classic car enthusiasts gear up for cowley exhibition
text: the third cowley classsic car exhibition begins today , showcasing the cowley car community , past and present .
organiser tanya field came to our studios with william , her 1991 rover 800 - one of the last cars to be built on the old north works .
the exhibition begins today and runs until saturday at templars square shopping centre .

documents.title: steam train blamed for field fire
text: embers from a passing steam train are being blamed for a field fire near the heritage railway line in chinnor .
six fire engines were needed to deal with the fire that affected an area of 4,000 sqm just off the lower icknield way .
this is a reminder that during hot dry weather we need to be very careful in the countryside with any kind of potential ignition source .

documents.title: 'nowhere to hide ' for rogue landlords as two more dragged before courts for shoddy houses
text: rogue landlords have been warned they have `` nowhere to hide '' as two more were hauled before the courts for charging seven people to live in ramshackle houses .
author: Oxford Mail

documents.title: transfer moves possible as injuries hit oxford united
text: oxford united may use the transfer market to bring in cover after injuries hit the squad in the first weekend of the league 1 season .
a crowd of more than 8,500 saw the u 's draw 1-1 at the kassam stadium on saturday .

following the match , head coach michael appleton revealed that christian ribeiro had up a minor ankle fracture on friday , aaron martin was unavailable due to bad blistering and fellow defender shay dunkley came off with a hamstring injury .

documents.title: stuck boy , 10 , rescued from seaside mud
text: a 10-year-old boy from faringdon has been rescued after becoming stuck in deep mud while trying to reach the sea at low tide .
the boy was spotted in difficulty by a beach warden at brean sands , somerset , on saturday afternoon .
he was kept calm by the warden until the rescue hovercraft arrived and safely returned him to his mother .
minutes later the same crew was called to rescue a male youth who had been spotted in the mud at nearby uphill .

documents.title: waits for child mental health care are 'real problem '
text: children who have been referred for mental health assessments in oxfordshire have faced waits of more than six months .
oxfordshire clinical commissioning group said 75 % of the time they should be seen within eight weeks .
but a report for its board said : `` waiting times remain some way below target , with 38 % of referrals assessed within eight weeks . ''
oxford health nhs trust said the waits did not meet its `` high standards '' .

documents.title: weather : brightening up with sunny spells by the afternoon
text: after a mainly cloudy start it will brighten up by the afternoon and feel pleasant in the sunshine .
one or two showers are possible but the brisk wind will slowly ease .
highs of 20c ( 68f ) .
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: from rio to the woodstock # lilym
text: radio oxford reporter lilley mitchell is flying the flag for , err , team bbc at the woodstock open air pool .
tom daley probably does n't need to worry too much about the competition
i did it ! !
my first dive off the 1m board !
thanks to jill .
how does tom daley jump off 10m ? !
# lilym @ twitterid

documents.title: chiltern mainline reopens after nine-day closure
text: the chiltern mainline from oxford , through bicester and banbury , to leamington spa has reopened after a nine-day closure .
it was shut for a £ 76m upgrade to the track layout at banbury and signalling along the line .
signalling before and after # siemens # banburyupgrade # railwayupgradeplan @ twitterid @ twitterid

documents.title: welcome to oxfordshire live
text: a very good morning to you all .
good weekend ?
it 's the start of the first full olympic weekend , and we 're going for a medal today for our performance in bringing you the latest headlines from around our county .
let us know what 's happening in your area via email , facebook or twitter .
